org.openimaj.util.comparator

Interface DistanceComparator<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object being compared
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ByteFVComparator, DoubleFVComparator, FacialFeatureComparator<T>, FloatFVComparator, FVComparator<T>, IntFVComparator, LongFVComparator, ShortFVComparator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteFVComparison, DoGSIFTFeatureComparator, DoubleFVComparison, FaceFVComparator, FloatFVComparison, GaussianKLDivergence, IntFVComparison, LongFVComparison, LtpDtFeatureComparator, ReversedLtpDtFeatureComparator, SampledMultivariateDistanceComparator, ShortFVComparison, SparseByteFVComparison, SparseDoubleFVComparison, SparseFloatFVComparison, SparseIntFVComparison, SparseLongFVComparison, SparseShortFVComparison

    public interface DistanceComparator<T>
    Interface for classes that can compare two objects and return a distance or similarity
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double compare(T o1, T o2)
      Compare two objects, returning a score or distance.
      boolean isDistance() 

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        double compare(T o1,
               T o2)
        Compare two objects, returning a score or distance.
        Parameters:
        o1 - the first object
        o2 - the second object
        Returns:
        a score or distance

      • isDistance

        boolean isDistance()
        Returns:
        true if the comparison is a distance; false if similarity.
